ResearchProjectDef.label: basis of vehicles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic machine tools and spare parts for vehicles.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->We have opened the era of new and convenient transportation
subject_story->It will be possible to forget about the old ways of moving
subject_story->We will be able to defend and attack better in the new era of the automotive industry

ResearchProjectDef.label: Jet transport ll
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reusable jet capsules that allow you to transport a large amount of cargo.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->Now we can take more cargo
subject_gerund->Years and faster and carry more
